bs-whoisonline-desc: Displays a list of users who are currently online
bs-whoisonline-pref-interval-help-label: The number of seconds after which the list of users is updated
bs-whoisonline-pref-maxidletime-help-lab: The number of seconds of inactivity after which a user is marked as offline
bs-whoisonline-tag-whoisonlinecount-desc: Shows the number of users who have logged in within the last 10 minutes
bs-whoisonline-tag-whoisonlinepopup-desc: Shows all users who have been logged in within the last 10 minutes. The output is a speech bubble when a user hovers over the related link
bs-whoisonline-statistics-report-login-n: Daily logins during the selected period
bs-whoisonline-droplet-count-description: Number of currently logged in users
bs-whoisonline-droplet-popup-description: Pop-up with a list of all users that are currently logged in
